oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1937: Flood refugees sit in Ellis Auditorium
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1937 flood; Ellis Auditorium; refugees; women; children; newspapers;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Commercial Appeal newspaper clipping showing flood refugees gathered in Ellis Auditorium. "In the 24-hour period ending last night, 3,000 refugees passed through Ellis Auditorium where they were registered and vaccinated before being assigned to Memphis' refugee camps. These are typical."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Elliott
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
